nodes.text: Delt Nerris was a starship pilot and a sympathizer of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

The Galactic Empire and the Corellian Security Forces organized a joint operation using the ship illegally-modified Short Hauler Nova Whisper, that had been captured from the pirate Dharus, as a bait for criminals. Delt Nerris was assigned to pilot the ship. Making use of his chance, Nerris hijacked the ship and gave it to the forces of the Alliance. The Alliance then added the ship to its forces on Asher III.
